TUTORIAL.TUTORIALS_TYPEUSER_USER: Corresponds to that user who already owns an account or wishes to register directly at energiaStore for their personal use
TUTORIAL.TUTORIALS_TYPEUSER_PARTNER: Corresponds to that user who already has an energy accountStore for business use.
TUTORIAL.TUTORIALS_TYPEUSER_EXPLORER: It corresponds to the user who wants to use the app without registration, his account is limited
TUTORIAL.TUTORIAL_TYPE_USER_TEXT: If you still have doubts you can contact us in the configuration section.
TUTORIAL.TUTORIAL_WELCOME_TEXT: Below we will explain the different profiles that exist in EnergiaStore
TUTORIAL.TUTORIALS_TYPE_USER_USER: Corresponds to that user who already owns an account or wishes to register directly with EnergiaStore for their personal use
TUTORIAL.TUTORIALS_TYPE_USER_PARTNER: Corresponds to that user who already has an account in EnergiaStore for business use.
TUTORIAL.TUTORIALS_TYPE_USER_EXPLORER: It corresponds to the user who wants to use the app without registration, his account is limited
TUTORIAL.FMP_MODAL_FIRST_TEXT_HEADER: Why do electricity companies charge me with this power factor penalty?
TUTORIAL.FMP_MODAL_FIRST_TEXT_FIRST_LINE: Chilean legislation allows electric power distribution companies to charge each customer a 1% surcharge on energy billing for each hundredth (0.01) in which the power factor (FP) of a facility is less than 0.93.
TUTORIAL.FMP_MODAL_FIRST_TEXT_SECOND_LINE: That means that if the power factor of a splice is 0.86, the distributor will charge a surcharge of 8% (0.93-0.85 = 0.08 = 8/100).
TUTORIAL.FMP_MODAL_FIRST_TEXT_THIRD_LINE: Why do I generate this power factor penalty?
TUTORIAL.FMP_MODAL_SECOND_TEXT_HEADER: ¿Como leer mi multa por mal factor de potencia?
TUTORIAL.FMP_MODAL_SECOND_TEXT_FIRST_LINE: For example, in the receipt of electricity from a school establishment, where the active and reactive energies are recorded by means of two energy meters, the following charges appear:
TUTORIAL.FMP_MODAL_SECOND_TEXT_SECOND_LINE: The active energy consumption is 4238 kWh and the reactive energy consumption is 3102 kVArh. Therefore, the monthly power factor is:
TUTORIAL.FMP_MODAL_SECOND_TEXT_THIRD_LINE: Then, the surcharge for power factor that appears on the receipt is obtained from: 0.93-0.8069 = 0.1231 x 358466 = $ 44.127.-
TUTORIAL.FMP_MODAL_THIRD_TEXT_HEADER: ¿How can you help me not pay more this power factor penalty?
TUTORIAL.FMP_MODAL_THIRD_TEXT_SECOND_LINE: At EnergiaStore, we conducted a POWER FACTOR STUDY AND IMPROVED POWER FACTOR, OPTIMIZING ITS ELECTRICAL INSTALLATION . We invite you to quote your project HERE or with us to the email info@energiastore.com or phone: + 569-9078 6921
